## InputProcessorDefinition.optionsSchema property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

JSON Schema for validating options (optional). Can be used by tooling for configuration validation.

**Signature:**

